climbs.name: Ozzy’s Arete
climbs.fa: Travis Foster, Drew Leiterman, Lee Leiterman

content.description:
One of the most accessible multi pitches in the EK!

climbs 6 pitches of high quality limestone up the obvious arete on the south pillar. fully bolted with a few little run-outs in the easy sections. Pitches can be linked with a 70m rope.

Needs a 70m rope for descent.



Pitches

1. 10a

2. 5.9

3. 5.8 R

4. 10c

5. 10a Rish 

6. 10c



Approach the pillars via burton lake North rd, hike to the south pillar (farthest right) and continue to the rock just right of the gully. 

Climb starts at the base of blunt west facing arête. 

Quickdraws, a few runners and maybe a few small cams/nuts for the top of the last pitch.

The South Pillar of the Lizzard Pillars. Currently (as of 2022) the only pillar with established routes.  
 Looking at the pillars from the highway the south pillar is on the right
